document_data.name: Graffen Disteaf
document_data.mainbody: '''Graffen Disteaf''' was a member of the [[Sembian High Council]] in [[Sembia]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Graffen was a stately but old individual.
document_data.Relationships: Graffen was a fervent supporter of fellow councilor [[Mirabeta Selkirk]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, after the death of [[Kendrick Selkirk]], Highspeaker [[Dernim Lossit]] summoned the Council on [[Marpenoth 10]] in order to elect the new Overmaster. The two main candidates were Countess Mirabeta Selkirk and [[Endren Corrinthal]] of [[Saerb]]. Graffen, alongside two other councilors, proposed the candidacy of Mirabeta.
